author: epa.gov
title: Biden-Harris Administration expands EPA program to bring wastewater sanitation services to 150 more underserved communities across Rural America | US EPA
text:
February 15, 2024 Contact Information EPA Region 4 Press Office ( ) (404) 562-8400 FRANKFORT, Ky. (Feb. 15, 2024) – The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) announced the expansion of its successful Closing America's Wastewater Access Gap Community Initiative to 150 additional communities as part of President Biden’s Investing America agenda. Originally launched in partnership with the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), the pilot initiative has been assisting 11 communities since 2022. This program, along with historic funding through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, will help thousands of Americans access the wastewater infrastructure they need to thrive to include Harlan County, Ky.
“Many rural and low-income communities in the U.S. lack basic running water and indoor plumbing, and our Closing America’s Wastewater Access Gap Program has been instrumental in helping communities from White Hall, Alabama to McDowell County, West Virginia to the San Carlos Apache Tribe in Arizona access Bipartisan Infrastructure Law funding to address this critical need,” said EPA Assistant Administrator for Water Radhika Fox. “In expanding the program to 150 additional communities, we are working to restore dignity and opportunity to underserved communities nationwide.”
Closing America’s Wastewater Access Gap Community Initiative
An estimated 2 million people in the U.S. live without adequate wastewater infrastructure and safe and reliable drinking water in their homes. Many more live with wastewater infrastructure that is ineffective and puts people’s health at risk. To date, the initiative has helped provide communities with no cost technical assistance that helps identify affordable options accessing wastewater infrastructure. For example, technical assistance providers help the community conduct assessments of the community’s specific needs and submit applications for wastewater funding. So far progress for the 11 pilot communities includes seven funding awards and 10 additional funding applications submissions. All 11 communities have drafted community solution plans, which are in the process of being finalized, and will be posted to EPA’s Closing America's Wastewater Access Gap webpage in the early spring.
Harlan County, Kentucky, Projects
The cities of Cumberland, Benham, and Lynch are discussing options to address compliance issues and are coordinating with Kentucky Energy and Environment Cabinet on next steps. Technical assistance providers continue to support the three cities with conducting rate studies and assessing wastewater system challenges, such as infiltration and inflow. The three cities of Cumberland, Benham, and Lynch share common city boundaries and are in need of long-term solutions to address numerous issues and violations with sewage collection systems and wastewater treatment plants. The pilot initiative explored many options to address these issues, including shared services and development of a new wastewater entity. The pilot initiative helped facilitate community engagement between all three cities. The events experienced good public participation and engagement. Each city is assessing options and has started to address infiltration and inflow issues with assistance from technical assistance providers. Interested communities can request assistance by completing the WaterTA request form .
Communities will be selected on a rolling basis; there is no deadline to apply. For questions, email SepticHelp@epa.gov.
Learn more about EPA’s WaterTA services and the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law’s historic $50 billion investment in America.
###

author: time news
title: The Best Flagship Smartphones of 2023: KT Review's Top Picks - timenews
text: 2023-12-28 13:07:00 The year 2023 is coming to an end, and it has been another year of exciting developments in the smartphone industry. Despite the sluggish economic situation, smartphones continue to be an essential part of daily life for many people. The competition to develop flagship smartphones that meet users’ needs has been fierce, with several brands vying to create the most appealing devices. In this roundup, we have selected five flagship mobile phones from the year 2023 that we believe stand out among the rest. Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra, launched at the beginning of the year, has made a significant impact with its outstanding features. It boasts an upgraded main camera with a resolution of up to 200 megapixels, allowing for super sharp and detailed images. The Nightography mode has also been updated to improve photography in low-light conditions. Xiaomi 13 Pro Although Xiaomi has already released the 14 Pro model, the Xiaomi 13 Pro, which was launched in Thailand at the beginning of 2023, has impressed with its camera capabilities. The collaboration with Leica has resulted in a triple camera setup that delivers professional-grade photography. It also offers DSLR-level focusing technology and two different shooting styles to choose from. iPhone 15 Pro The iPhone 15 Pro marks a new era for Apple’s flagship smartphone lineup, featuring aerospace-grade materials like titanium for enhanced strength and durability. The device’s design, screen size, and performance have all been upgraded, making it a standout choice for users looking for a premium smartphone experience. READ Also: Samsung version of MIX Alpha exposure: the screen ratio of the surround screen solution exceeds 100% | XFastest News Samsung Galaxy Z Flip5 The Galaxy Z Flip5 represents a significant upgrade in the foldable smartphone category. The device features an improved external screen, making it more convenient for users to perform various tasks without opening the phone’s inner screen. VERTU METAVERT The VERTU METAVERT is a luxurious British smartphone that has made a comeback in Thailand. It supports WEB3 and BLOCKCHAIN systems, offering high-tech features along with exquisite design and exclusive services. As we look ahead to the next year, we anticipate more exciting developments in the smartphone industry. With several brands striving to create even more advanced phones, we can expect to see continued innovation in smartphone technology. #likes #model #raise #hand #flagship #mobile #phones #perspective #Review

author: Dawn Magyar | DMagyar@njadvancemedia.com
title: Carhartt has its ultra-warm jackets on sale for 40% off in a rare winter deal
text:
Carhartt is having a “Winter Sale” and there’s no better time to snag one of its heavy-duty jackets to keep you warm.
The sale has 40% off men’s and women’s jackets, coats, vests, and more.
Buy Now
This includes big discounts on Carhartt’s Rain Defender jackets, Storm Defender jackets, and popular outdoor vests. These deals couldn’t come at a better time as those frigid temperatures continue to bear down this winter.
With these Carhartt deals, you’ll save big and you’ll also score a jacket that will stand up to the elements, keeping you warm and dry. If you’re not familiar with Carhartt’s Rain Defender technology, you will be soon, once this water-repellent fabric forces rain and water to bead up and roll off your jacket.
Looking for even more durability? Carhartt’s Storm Defender jackets offer waterproof protection in a breathable style that keeps you dry inside and out.
But if you’re working in the elements of winter, you already know that Carhartt’s Super Dux jackets are an outdoor staple. These ultra-tough, warm, and durable jackets are designed to keep up with you and the demands of the job.
Want more Carhartt deals? This “Winter Sale” also has 40% off its famous hoodies, T-shirts, [work pants](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fc%2Fbottoms-sale), and those can’t-live-without [Carhartt knit hats](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fc%2Faccessories-sale).
Shop deals on Carhartt winter gear
Here’s a look at some of the best [jacket deals](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fc%2Fjackets-coats-sale) (and more) you can score during [Carhartt’s big “Winter Sale.”](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fc%2Fsale)
[Montana Puffer Vest (Women)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F105607%2Fwomens-montana-puffer-vest---insulated---reversible)for $72, instead of $120[Rain Jacket (Women)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F104221%2Fwomens-rain-jacket---relaxed-fit---lightweight---1-warm-rating)for $48, instead of $80[Storm Defender Jacket (Women)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F102382%2Fwomens-storm-defender-jacket---relaxed-fit---heavyweight---1-warm-rating)for $78, instead of $130[Super Dux Mock-Neck Jacket (Men)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F105342%2Fsuper-dux-relaxed-fit-lightweight-mock-neck-jacket---1-warm-rating)for $72-$78, instead of $120-$130[Rain Defender Softshell Hooded Jacket (Men)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F103829%2Frain-defender-relaxed-fit-midweight-softshell-hooded-jacket---1-warm-rating)for $72-$78, instead of $120-$130[Storm Defender Jacket (Men)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F104670%2Fmens-storm-defender-jacket---loose-fit---heavyweight)for $84-$93, instead of $140-$155[Washed Duck Sherpa-Lined Vest (Men)](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587338&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.carhartt.com%2Fproduct%2F104394%2Frelaxed-fit-washed-duck-sherpa-lined-vest)for $48-$54, instead of $80-$90

author: none@none.com (Recorder Report)
title: Sindh govt to take action against stockpiling of urea
text: KARACHI: The government of Sindh has decided to take action against those who are stockpiling urea fertilizer and selling it at high prices. The decision was made at a meeting held under the chairmanship of Sindh Chief Secretary Dr Muhammad Fakhre Alam and was attended by Agriculture Secretary Syed Aijaz Shah, Karachi Commissioner Muhammad Saleem Rajput and Director General Extension, Manir Ahmad Jamani. Other Divisional Commissioners and Deputy Commissioners also participated in the meeting through video link. A detailed briefing was provided during the meeting regarding the demand for urea fertilizer and its supply to farmers. The Agriculture Department officials highlighted that penalties amounting to Rs. 4 million have been imposed against 175 hoarders in the province. Furthermore, licenses of 41 dealers have been suspended. Division Commissioners also gave a briefing on measures to ensure the supply of fertilizers at discounted prices. Chief Secretary Sindh Dr. Muhammad Fakhre Alam directed all Deputy Commissioners to ensure 100% stock verification of urea fertilizer in their respective districts. Strict action will be taken against the hoarders of urea. The amount of fine should also be increased and if the dealer is found repeatedly involved in hoarding, further action should be taken against the dealer as per law. He further said that the stored urea fertilizer should be confiscated and auctioned at the official rate. Chief Secretary Sindh said that it will be recommended to the federal government that all deputy commissioners should be given access to the dashboard related to urea fertilizer so that stock verification and action against hoarders can be done effectively. author: @infobae
title: Histórico: el gol con el que San Marino, “la peor selección del mundo”, ganó un partido tras 20 años - Infobae
text:
* El video del grito de Sensoli
San Marino , el equipo más débil del planeta según el ranking de la FIFA, donde ocupa la posición 210, ha logrado lo inesperado: cortó una racha maldita de 141 partidos sin ganar con una histórica victoria por 1-0 contra Liechtenstein en la UEFA Nations League .
Nicko Sensoli , un joven de apenas 19 años, fue el héroe de la jornada al marcar el gol solitario que decidió el encuentro. Su tanto fue suficiente para que San Marino rompiera con veinte años de sequía de victorias, desde el último triunfo logrado el 28 de abril de 2004, también contra Liechtenstein.
Sucedió a los 52 minutos de partido, cuando tras un centro al área de los derrotados fue peinado por un defensor, otro durmió, y el citado Sensoli, por atrás, apareció para pellizcar el balón y batir al arquero adversario. El equipo y los fanáticos celebraron dicho triunfo como si fuera la final del Mundial. La victoria ha sido apenas la segunda en la historia del conjunto sanmarinense; la primera en un cotejo oficial.
Este hito resalta aún más al considerar la racha desfavorable de San Marino: 141 partidos sin conocer la victoria, acumulando apenas seis empates y 135 derrotas, con 21 goles a favor y 568 en contra.
El impacto del triunfo se extiende también por la geografía y demografía del pequeño país. San Marino, con una población de cerca de 36,000 habitantes dispersos en 61,2 km², ha encontrado una razón para celebrar que unifica a todos sus ciudadanos. Los festejos se extendieron hasta el Palazzo Pubblico, donde se congregaron cientos de personas para compartir la alegría de un logro tan esquivo.
No obstante, a pesar de la alegría del momento, la historia de San Marino en el fútbol es rica en derrotas, pero también en pequeñas alegrías, como los empates históricos contra otras selecciones. Entre estas igualdades se destacan dos con Liechtenstein (en un amistoso y en otra Liga de Naciones), dos en Eliminatorias mundialistas (contra Turquía y Letonia), uno en Eliminatorias para la Eurocopa (Estonia) y algunos otros como contra Gibraltar, Seychelles (el primer empate contra una selección de otro continente), Santa Lucía y San Cristóbal y Nieves.
Este reciente éxito también puede considerarse como una continuación de una tímida pero visible mejoría en la capacidad ofensiva de San Marino. De hecho, venía de convertir en cuatro partidos consecutivos por primera vez.
Un argentino fue parte de la gesta: se trata de Dante Rossi , categoría 87, y oriundo de Pergamino. De pasado en la cantera de Newell’s, actuó como titular, terminó con la cinta de capitán en el brazo y se integró a la montonera con la que el plantel celebró un hito involvidable para el conjunto que durante décadas fue calificado como “la peor selección del mundo” .
Al margen de lo que este triunfo pueda significar en términos de puntos y clasificaciones futuras, lo más importante para San Marino es el impacto emocional y el histórico que tiene para el país y sus habitantes. Un gol, por sencillo que pueda parecer, ha puesto fin a dos décadas de frustración deportiva.

author: Isabel Lucas
title: “Podemos contar a história da escravatura de outra maneira, seguindo o dinheiro?” | Entrevista | PÚBLICO
text: O jornalista David Montero seguiu o rasto do dinheiro desde a fundação do seu país, os Estados Unidos. Escreveu um livro que ajuda a entender o fosso entre ricos e pobres. A escravatura está na raiz. O que significa reparação quando aplicada a um passado ligado a potências escravocratas e colónias? A pergunta tem cada vez mais importância quanto mais divide opiniões e leva à criação de um pensamento ou de narrativas que põem em causa ou complexificam as tradicionais. David Montero, jornalista premiado, vai à génese do seu país, os Estados Unidos, para mostrar que “a ferida aberta” sobre a qual ele se fundou não se refere apenas ao passado nem ao Sul. Diz que os grandes bancos do Norte, como o Citibank ou o Bank of America, financiaram a escravatura e beneficiaram fortemente do seu envolvimento nesse tipo de negócios, fazendo parte de uma economia que cresceu exercendo poder sobre o corpo negro. Montero diz ainda que esta não é uma questão do passado. É do presente e do futuro. E não apenas da nação americana. Tem ramificações na Europa e no resto do mundo. Para chegar a essas conclusões, cruzou factos, fez investigação histórica e jornalística e propõe um novo olhar sobre o termo reparação em The Stolen Wealth of Slavery: A Case for Reparations. Esteve em Lisboa para participar no seminário Slavery Impacts & Meaningful Change, na Faculdade de Ciências Sociais da Universidade Nova de Lisboa, organizado pela Unbreakable Heritage, vocacionada para a educação, defesa, promoção e sensibilização para a realidade histórica e os impactos actuais da escravatura negra enquanto genocídio.

author: The Standard
title: 'Sensational' Gunners fire warning to Reds
text:
Mikel Arteta warned Liverpool that "sensational" Arsenal are back in the English Premier League title race after beating Tottenham 2-1 in the north London derby.
Desperately needing a win, Arteta's side staged a stirring fightback after Son Heung Min's early opener for the visitors.
Dominic Solanke's own goal hauled the Gunners level before Leandro Trossard's strike put them ahead late in the first half.
Second-placed Arsenal's first win in four games moved them within four points of Liverpool.
Although Arne Slot's team have a game in hand, Arteta is convinced Arsenal have what it takes to track down the Anfield club.
Asked if Arsenal are title contenders, Arteta said: "Yeah we are. There is so much to play for."
It was a cathartic victory for Arsenal, who had been knocked out of the FA Cup third round by 10-man Manchester United on penalties on Sunday, just days after losing 2-0 at home to Newcastle in the League Cup semi-final first leg.
But Arteta, whose side face another test against Aston Villa tomorrow, was relieved to see his players show the hunger.
"We were sensational. It was a big test after two games and not getting rewarded," he said.
"We were incredibly good in the last game against United and we ended up losing somehow.
"It's how you respond to a situation... they want to go on the pitch.
"It was a test of attitude, what we are made of, the courage we have. From minute one, we fully deserved to win."
Ange Postecoglou slammed his Tottenham flops as "nowhere near good enough" after the defeat in which Spurs "were too passive."
"Too many losses this year. Too many games getting away from us. It needs to stop," the Tottenham manager said.
AGENCE FRANCE-PRESSE

author: sina.com.cn
title: 辽宁方大总医院开展"爱肺计划"惠民行动_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
转自：辽宁日报
何建行教授在辽宁方大总医院为“爱肺计划”一期筛查高危患者面诊。 受访单位供图 核心提示
4月15日至21日是全国肿瘤防治宣传周。数据显示，肺癌已成为我国发病率、死亡率最高的肿瘤之一。近日，辽宁方大总医院携手国家呼吸医学中心主任、广州医科大学附属第一医院教授何建行及其团队推出“爱肺计划”，通过低剂量螺旋CT等精准筛查手段，实现“早发现、早干预、早获益”三重效应：早期诊断率大幅提升，中晚期发病率显著降低，人均医疗支出明显减少。
此次活动，面向社会释放5000个免费筛查名额，不仅是惠及东北患者的“健康礼包”，更是医疗机构践行“健康中国2030”战略的主动尝试，通过提前介入扫除隐患，在挽救生命的同时，也避免了患者家庭的大额医疗支出，节约医保资金，体现了“防大于治”的公共卫生理念。
肺癌早筛的“民生答卷”：
5000个免费名额背后的筛防体系重构
肺癌早筛，是恶性肿瘤筛查的重点之一。早期筛查、早期评估、早期干预，是降低肺癌发病率和死亡率的重要手段。目前，低剂量螺旋CT筛查是发现早期肺癌最有效方法之一，这种方式可检出直径小于1厘米的微小肺癌，检出的肺癌绝大多数为早期肺癌，术后10年生存率极高。不仅能够大大提升患者存活率，还能提早干预降低中晚期患病概率，节约百姓就医成本。
此次，辽宁方大总医院携手国家呼吸医学中心主任、广州医科大学附属第一医院何建行教授团队，实施“爱肺计划”肺癌早筛活动，为辽沈地区的患者提供早筛的平台，释放5000个免费筛查名额。通过低剂量螺旋CT等精准筛查手段，提高肺癌早期诊断率，为广大民众筑牢健康防线，以实际行动践行辽宁方大总医院“对国家有利、对社会有利、对医患有利”的办院理念。
民营医疗的“创新样本”：
超大型综合医疗体的软硬件双擎力
作为辽宁 方大集团 大健康产业的旗舰医院，辽宁方大总医院以“超大型单体综合医院”格局刷新区域医疗高度：坐落于沈抚改革创新示范区，占地323亩、建筑面积62万平方米、规划床位5000张，配备60余间全数字化手术室，以及3.0T高场强MRI、256排能谱CT等国际顶尖设备，构建起精准诊疗的硬件矩阵。
在人才与技术层面，医院以“国家队”标准筑峰，汇聚20余位院士级合作专家、百余名副高以上资深专家，所有医生均具备三甲医院工作经验。此次与何建行教授团队合作，更将其独创的“单孔胸腔镜技术”“肺癌微创治疗体系”等先进技术引入，让区域内患者无须跨省即可享受国际水准诊疗服务。
医疗资源的“磁场效应”：
从“引进来”到“本土化”的能级跃升
辽宁方大总医院不仅侧重于单点突破，更注重构建多维立体的医疗资源整合体系。
上接“国家队”，与上海瑞金医院达成战略协作，开设“瑞金专家门诊”“远程会诊中心”，将国家级重点专科资源平移至东北，推动优质医疗技术常态化落地。下联“基层网”，通过医联体建设，与东北三省多家基层医院建立“筛查-诊断-治疗-康复”全链条协作机制，推动优质医疗资源向基层延伸。
内塑技术极，以“爱肺计划”为契机，整合影像诊断、病理检测、微创治疗等多学科力量，强化肺癌筛查与诊疗技术的本地化创新，提升区域整体诊疗水平。
辽宁方大总医院响应国家战略，以“爱肺计划”为契机，携手何建行教授团队，整合多学科力量与自身硬软件优势，强化本地化技术创新，在肺癌防治中成效显著。此民生工程以“防大于治”理念节约医疗成本，未来将为健康中国战略落地提供可复制经验，惠及更多民众。
林溪
